frontmatter.description: When the next big change is beyond control, a feeling of being unanchored can develop.
frontmatter.title: Unstuck in time

frontmatter.description: Use intrinsic motivation to generate energy. Extrinsic motivators are limiting.
frontmatter.title: Generate energy intrinsically

frontmatter.description: Revise requirements as new information becomes available. Don't assume the original path is the only way forward.
frontmatter.title: Move projects forward with fresh perspectives

frontmatter.description: Not every job requires the same tools. Take time to consider the purpose first.
frontmatter.title: Use the appropriate tool

frontmatter.description: Be a better father by being a better role model. Demonstrate string virtues and values. Take time and be supportive.
frontmatter.title: Be the person you want your kids to be

frontmatter.description: Look for ways to support others by default.
frontmatter.title: Default to supporting others

frontmatter.description: Spend more time observing and listening in conversation. Don't rush to speak or give opinions. It's needed less than you think.
frontmatter.title: Listen and observe more in conversation

frontmatter.description: Make regular time to declutter mind. It's worth the time and having a regular time makes it easier to trust those distractions will be addressed.
frontmatter.title: Make regular time to declutter mind

frontmatter.description: When the world changes drastically, the mind can become decluttered easily. There's a lot to process and there are many changes, some readily apparently and others in the subconcious.
frontmatter.title: Declutter mind to address anxieties

frontmatter.description: Tools are only tools if they are being used with a purposed. When used haphazardly, tools are easily changed to distractions.
frontmatter.title: Use tools with a purpose
